verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:11
verses.text: Which also were accounted giants, as the Anakims; but the Moabites call them Emims.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:12
verses.text: The Horims also dwelt in Seir beforetime; but the children of Esau succeeded them, when they had destroyed them from before them, and dwelt in their stead; as Israel did unto the land of his possession, which the Lord gave unto them.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 2:13
verses.text: Now rise up, said I, and get you over the brook Zered. And we went over the brook Zered.
